name: Bunny Herder
description:
You are the community teacher bunny and have to gather the little bunny students back into your classroom for their next lesson.

But uh oh! There’s a hungry fox on the loose looking for a snack….

Your goal is to gather all of your little bunny students and bring them safely back to the center burrow.

How to Play

  • You have 3 lives and will lose 1 every time the fox gets a student bunny.
  • There are 2 temporary power ups that will randomly pop up throughout the game. To activate them, move the teacher bunny over them.
  • Carrot: gives speed boost to teacher bunny
  • Snowflake: stops fox from moving

Controls:

  • Use WASD or arrow keys to move the teacher bunny.
  • To pick up the student bunnies, go over to them and teacher bunny will automatically pick them up.
  • Press spacebar to drop the student bunnies in the center burrow.
  • Press the ‘P’ key to pause the game.

Game/Team Background Info:

This game was created for the first game jam hosted by Design Buddies. This team has never met before the event but we all were able to quickly work together well to create this game within the 1 week deadline (Dec.16 - Dec.23, 2020).

Team Members:

  • Daniel Nimmervoll
  • Keanna Lam
  • Vine Miranda Righi
  • Derusha Baskaran
  • Luke Yin

Thanks for hopping over to play Bunny Herder!
